thread.title: Familiar! CBB fans reckon the old Diary Room chair from series three made a cameo in the fairytale task
thread.title_full: Familiar! CBB fans reckon the old Diary Room chair from series three made a cameo in the fairytale task

author: Lara Martin
title: Familiar! CBB fans reckon the old Diary Room chair from series three made a cameo in the fairytale task
text:
Familiar! CBB fans reckon the old Diary Room chair from series three made a cameo in the fairytale task The big red chair first appeared in Big Brother 3, which aired way back in 2002 Share Click to play Tap to play The video will start in 8 Cancel Play now Telling Tales with James C Share this video Get celebs updates directly to your inbox + Subscribe Thank you for subscribing! Could not subscribe, try again later Invalid Email 
Celebrity Big Brother fans thought they spied a blast from the past on the latest episode: the old Diary Room chair from series three! 
Eagle-eyed CBB viewers took to Twitter after watching James Cosmo on Thursday night reading a fairytale while perched on an oversized red seat that looked very familiar. 
One wrote: “OMG. It’s the BB3 Diary Room chair!” 
Another said: “Is this the old Diary Room chair he’s in from Big Brother 3!” 
Big Brother 3 aired back in 2002 and featured contestants including the late Jade Goody, Kate Lawler and Alex Sibley. The big red chair looked familiar! (Photo: Channel 5) James C sat on the chair while reading fairytales (Photo: Rex Features) 
A third viewer added: “Is James C sat on the @BBIUK series 3 Diary Room chair??” 
A further fan remarked: “That chair James is sitting on reading the story looks familiar.” 
Good spot! 
We've contacted CBB to find out if it's really the old chair or just a very convincing lookalike! James C read a bedtime story in the latest task (Photo: Rex Features) He assigned roles which the housemates then acted out (Photo: Channel 5) 
The red chair popped up at the end of Thursday night's episode, when Big Brother asked the housemates to recreate a bedtime fairy tale. 
James C narrated the story and assigned roles. 
Bianca Gascoigne was the princess who wanted to get to the ball to be with her true love, Prince Nicola. Coleen Nolan was the fairy godmother, Kim Woodburn was the evil wizard, and Jedward acted the part of a two-headed troll. 
*CBB concludes tomorrow at 9pm on Channel 5 Read More
